**This is the document from the practical of Module 2, Genomics and Next-generation sequencing.**

The aims of this practical are:

* Perform a standard analysis for examining one single cell sample

* Perform an integration analysis for exploring the cellular heterogeneity across multiple samples

* Perform differential expression analysis using pseudo-bulk approach
